T02TD3656E:264a-1: ba su dh'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD3656E:264a-3: lha mo nor gyi rgyun gyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD3656E:264a-4: lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3656E:264a-5: de nas lha mo nor gyi rgyun bsgom par 'dod na thams cad snga ma bzhin du byas la /
T02TD3656E:264a-6: gzhan du nas bod drug pa'i gsum pa la zla ba phyed pa dang /
T02TD3656E:264a-7: thig les brgyan pa de nyid las byung ba'i lha mo nor gyi rgyun sku mdog ser po /
T02TD3656E:264a-9: g-yon 'bras s'a lu'i snye ma dang /
T02TD3656E:264a-10: rin po che sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs pa'i bum pa bsnams pa /
T02TD3656E:264a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02TD3656E:264a-12: grogs kyi lha mos bskor ba'i lha mo nor gyi rgyun ni bdag nyid yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3656E:264a-13: lag pa gnyis kyi khu tshur bcings la gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bcag pa 'di ni lha mo nor gyi rgyun gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3656E:264a-14: de nas bzlas brjod byas te /
T02TD3656E:264a-15: aom shr'i ba su ni dha na kshe tre sv'a h'a /
T02TD3656E:264a-16: ras bris la sogs par bcom ldan 'das lha mo nor gyi rgyun spyan drangs la mchod pa yang bya ste /
T02TD3656E:264a-18: des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do //
T02TD3656E:264a-19: lha mo nor gyi rgyun sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so /
